name: new worker
normalized: assistant saitou!

name: yuu
normalized: …nn?
i was greeted by a hurried staff member from behindafter walking a little from misleet's detention cell.

name: yuu
normalized: is something wrong?
upon closer inspection, the rookie staff member thathad called out to me was behaving a little like fiohad done earlier.

name: new worker
normalized: hah…hah, hah, the bureau chief…, now, injured…hah, hah…

name: yuu
normalized: eh?
whether or not it was from being so flustered,i wasn't quite able to get the gist from those words.
but, i could tell from his look that it was aserious matter.

name: yuu
normalized: please settle down a little and speak more slowly

name: new worker
normalized: y…yes sir
i made the rookie staff member calm down by placingboth of my hands on his shoulders.

name: yuu
normalized: …now, what's the matter?

name: new worker
normalized: in the town areas earlier, bureau chief fio gotinjured in one of the small scale fights…

name: yuu
normalized: what?

name: new worker
normalized: it doesn't look like the injury is serious, but…i guess the assistant should get to the medical room

name: yuu
normalized: …understood
if i could speak my mind, then i didn't think itwas necessary to go if it wasn't serious, but.
but, i headed to the medical room with the rookiestaff member since i was in the position of masqueradingas fio's aide.

name: yuu
normalized: bureau chief, are you all right?

name: fio
normalized: ah, yuu-san
fio's energy-filled voice hit me the moment ientered the medical room in sync with the quickpace of the rookie staff member.

name: yuu
normalized: how is your injury?

name: fio
normalized: yeah, i'm all right
the green-haired little girl, who didn't appear tobe hurt at all, lightly traced her stomach in response.

name: fio
normalized: actually i was just grazed, but everyone got worriedand made me use the cell regeneration machine…
she seemed a little embarrassed by the place shewas tracing saying that now.
a cell regeneration machine was a medical treatmentdevice that had been manufactured with technologybeyond this planet.
it was limited to treating cuts and burns andwas quite a useful machine as it only left a tinyitch afterwards.

name: fio
normalized: everyone, thank you♪
after saying her thanks to the staff that hadauthorized the use of the medical room machine,fio turned to me.

name: fio
normalized: forgive me for worrying you too, yuu-san

name: yuu
normalized: no, i'm just glad you're okay
it was likely the fringes of dozuma members that werecommitting small scale crimes at my proposal.
i shook my head at fio blushing her cheeks a littlefor whatever reason.

name: yuu
normalized: well then, i've got today's interrogation reportto get to

name: fio
normalized: yeah
and so, i went to leave the medical room behind with that simple farewell.

name: メディカルスタッフ
normalized: …oh?
but, a staff member inside of the room raised hisvoice as i took a step forward.

name: fio
normalized: haeh?
is something wrong?

name: メディカルスタッフ
normalized: n, no…it's just the stock of medicine on themedicine shelves, it's like they've diminished sincethe last time i saw them…
he had spoken a bit doubtfully, but he kept astern expression.
i guess it was only natural if you considered thelikelihood of perhaps some of the alien medicine thatwas in this room leaking out outside of the facility.

name: yuu
normalized: …could it just be your imagination?
but, in reality, being the one that had carried themedicine on the shelves out of here in secret and wasusing them, i responded in a calm fashion.

name: メディカルスタッフ
normalized: n, no.
i could have sworn i had seen them therein the beginning, but…
my voice appeared to have come across a littleoppressively unbeknownst to me.
the staff members in their slightly witheredappearance turned their eyes from me to fio.

name: fio
normalized: that's a problem if it's true, huh.
would you mind checking up on the records a little?
feeling a sense of crisis the same as the medical staff, fio nodded with a bold expression that she didn't show very often.

name: yuu
normalized: ah, shall i check up on it in that case?
i do have an understanding of the people that havethe authority to open the medicine shelves.

name: fio
normalized: no, i think yuu-san is busy with misleet'sinterrogation, so it's okay

name: yuu
normalized: …oh…right

name: fio
normalized: yeah♪
i nodded a little at fio's smiling face as i put onan ambiance that you might say wasn't suspicious in theleast.
…but my mind wasn't at all calm.
the medicine i had stolen from the medicine shelvesweren't effective on their own and required a savvy personto mix them into some very explosive effects.
in other words, it would be a huge deal if it got outthat i had a part in not only taking, but mixing up thelost medicine to create those kinds of effects.
it was impossible for some earthling to know so muchabout medicine outside of the earth's.

name: yuu
normalized: （this is not good…）
i had better make something happen and quick.

name: yuu
normalized: no…something else i think
i shook my head and negated that thought that hadcome into my mind for a moment.
my mind had decided it wouldn't interfere with misleet.

name: yuu
normalized: （i guess i'll make preparations and begin tomorrow…）
i left the medical room, deciding in my mind something that no one else would know but me.
